participant_1.background:
I cherish the memories I've made with my friends and family more than anything else.
i work in the emergency room.
i have not spoken to my family in years.
I love using my creative talents to make a difference in the world.
I am an Indian-American wedding photographer.

participant_2.background:
I miss my family when I'm busy with work.
I love listening to rap music with my dog.
my grandma raised me.
I have a brand new car to match my new mansion.
I play the piano to relax and keep my mind off of my diabetes and fears.

content.text: It's going great! I just got back from a run. How are you doing today?
Doing well! I'm taking a break from work to hang out with my dog.
That's awesome! I love dogs. What breed is yours?
She's a golden retriever! Her name is Bella.
Bella is a beautiful name! I used to have a golden retriever named Buddy when I was a kid.
Golden retrievers are the best! They're so friendly and loving.
They are! I miss having one around.
Well, if you ever want to meet Bella, you're welcome to come over.
That's so nice of you! I would love to meet Bella!
Great! I'll send you my address.
